website_summaries.verdict: Most people love this product, especially the cooling sensation to their skin upon waking, plus its puffiness-diminishing effect and lightening of dark circles.
pros: Cooling sensation feels comforting to under-eye area
Most people are happy with this product and have found that it is an effective treatment for under-eye puffiness
cons: For some, they didn't see any difference in their dark circles, which the product claims to lighten

customer_reviews.title: Pharmapacks Has a No Return Policy - Product is Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: My wife ordered this product to lighten dark under eye circles and reduce puffiness. She was aware that Garnier Skin Active Clearly Brighter Anti-Puff Eye Roller is not a concealer and not an under eye moisturizer. This product is clear and does not brighten the under eye area at all, in fact, it emphasizes dark circles and also causes a mild burning under the eye. It is false for Garnier to make claims that it "has a cooling gel formula that brightens skin in just one use".
customer_reviews.author: Gail C.

customer_reviews.title: Helps reduce puffiness under eyes
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. I have puffy under eyes and this product really helps that area. Want brighter, smoother skin in just one week? Try Garnier SkinActive’s Clearly Brighter, our antioxidant-powered range of expertly formulated skincare. The following products are included in the Clearly Brighter range. The face scrub with Argan Nut gently exfoliates to brighten and deeply cleanse skin. This formula with sustainably-sourced argan nut shell, Vitamin C and a fruit acid blend, gently polishes and evens skin tone. The face moisturizers with SPF 15 and SPF 30 help reduce visible signs of sun damage including dark spots, age spots and discoloration. These face lotions improve skin’s texture and reduce wrinkles overtime. The fast-absorbing, non-greasy formulas include an antioxidant complex of Vitamin C and E and Lipo-Hydroxyl Acid (LHA). The dark spot treatments include a dark spot corrector and Vitamin C serum. These treatments even out skin tone and reduce the look of dark spots, age spots and discoloration. The anti-puff and anti-dark circle eye rollers reduce under-eye puffiness and visible bags. The targeted eye formulas include antioxidant Vitamin C, Mint and Caffeine.
